summary: Agencies need effective performance management systems to hold employees accountable for results and achieve their missions. Although the Office of Personnel Management—the government’s central human resources agency—has identified potentially innovative performance management practices, it needs to do a better job of sharing them with agencies. We recommended , among other things, steps OPM should take to make this information more accessible. Graphic showing these 5...
title: Federal Workforce: Opportunities Exist for OPM to Further Innovation in Performance Management
